Username.label: Channel Username
Username.tooltip: Username of the channel this will interact with.

OauthToken.label: Oauth Token (Do Not Share)
OauthToken.tooltip: The oauth token used to interact with the channel.

RewardName1.label: Reward Name
RewardName1.tooltip: The reward used to trigger this toggle.

SceneName1.label: Scene Name
SceneName1.tooltip: The name of the scene where the source that will be toggled resides.

SourceName1.label: Source Name
SourceName1.tooltip: The name of the source that will be toggled.

ToggleTime1.label: Toggle Duration (Seconds)
ToggleTime1.tooltip: How long the source will be toggled for.
